mapper.insert:
select TNT_ORDER_ID_SEQ.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO TNT_ORDER ( TNT_ORDER_ID , ORDER_ID , PARTNER_ORDER_ID , CHANNEL_ID , DISTRIBUTOR_ID , ORDER_AMOUNT , IS_REFUND , CREATE_TIME , PRODUCT_ID , PRODUCT_NAME , PAYMENT_STATUS , PAYMENT_TIME , APPROVE_STATUS , PERFORM_STATUS , VISIT_TIME , ORDER_STATUS , RESOURCE_CONFIRM_STATUS , DISTRIBUTOR_NAME , PRODUCT_TYPE, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_MOBLIE, RESOURCE_LACK_REASON, QUANTITY, SETTLE_STATUS, PAYMENT_TARGET, category_Id, order_Channel, create_operator, COMMENTS_CASHBACK, diminish_Amount, commission_amount, COMMON_COMMISSION_AMOUNT, SYS_FLAG, SHAREROOM, DOWNPAYMENT_AMOUNT, DIST_ACTUAL_PAY, NOTICE_STATUS, OID, DISTRIBUTOR_SUB_NAME, TNT_CPS_COMMISSION_STATUS ) VALUES ( #{tntOrderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{orderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{partnerOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{channelId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{distributorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{isRefund,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , sysdate, #{productId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{paymentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{approveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{performStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{visitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{resourceConfirmStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{distributorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{contactMoblie,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{resourceLackReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{quantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{settleStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commentsCashback,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{diminishAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{commissionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{commonCommissionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sysFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareRoom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downpaymentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{distActualPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{noticeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{subName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tntCpsCommissionStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE TNT_ORDER SET ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , PARTNER_ORDER_ID = #{partnerOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , DISTRIBUTOR_ID = #{distributorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , ORDER_AMOUNT = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , IS_REFUND = #{isRefund,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , PAYMENT_STATUS = #{paymentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , PAYMENT_TIME = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , VISIT_TIME = #{visitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , APPROVE_STATUS = #{approveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , PERFORM_STATUS = #{performStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , RESOURCE_CONFIRM_STATUS = #{resourceConfirmStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , DISTRIBUTOR_NAME = #{distributorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CONTACT_MOBLIE = #{contactMoblie,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , RESOURCE_LACK_REASON = #{resourceLackReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SETTLE_STATUS = #{settleStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , PRODUCT_TYPE = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , PAYMENT_TARGET = #{paymentTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REFUND_STATUS= #{refundStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REFUND_AMOUNT= #{refundAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMMENTS_CASHBACK= #{commentsCashback,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DIST_ACTUAL_PAY = #{distActualPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,PAYMENT_TYPE = #{paymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE
TNT_ORDER_ID = #{tntOrderId}

UPDATE TNT_ORDER
PAYMENT_STATUS = #{paymentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
PAYMENT_TIME = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
APPROVE_STATUS = #{approveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
PERFORM_STATUS = #{performStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
REFUND_STATUS = #{refundStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
REFUND_AMOUNT= #{refundAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SMS_TIMES = #{smsTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
WHERE TNT_ORDER_ID = #{tntOrderId}

UPDATE TNT_ORDER
PAYMENT_STATUS = #{paymentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
PAYMENT_TIME = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
APPROVE_STATUS = #{approveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
PERFORM_STATUS = #{performStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
REFUND_STATUS = #{refundStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
REFUND_AMOUNT= #{refundAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SMS_TIMES = #{smsTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId}

UPDATE TNT_ORDER
TNT_CPS_COMMISSION_STATUS = #{tntCpsCommissionStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
ORDER_AMOUNT = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
PAYMENT_TIME = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
PAYMENT_STATUS = #{paymentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_FLAG = '' ,
WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId}

UPDATE TNT_ORDER
REFUND_STATUS = #{refundStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REFUND_AMOUNT= #{refundAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TNT_CPS_COMMISSION_STATUS= #{tntCpsCommissionStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM TNT_ORDER WHERE TNT_ORDER_ID = #{id}

SELECT
FROM TNT_ORDER WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId}

if.test: productType != null and productType !='' and productType !='TRAFFIC'
productType != null and productType !='' and productType =='TRAFFIC'

sql.if: AND o.distributor_id in (select tud.user_id from tnt_user_detail tud where tud.company_type_id = #{companyTypeId})

if.test: param.productType != null and param.productType !='' and param.productType !='TRAFFIC'
param.productType != null and param.productType !='' and param.productType =='TRAFFIC'

sql.if: AND o.distributor_id in (select tud.user_id from tnt_user_detail tud where tud.company_type_id = #{param.companyTypeId})

mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM TNT_ORDER o

SELECT
FROM TNT_ORDER o

SELECT
FROM TNT_ORDER o

SELECT ,decode(d.company_name,null,(select u.real_name from tnt_user u where u.user_id=d.user_id),d.company_name) COMPANY_NAME FROM TNT_ORDER o INNER JOIN TNT_USER_DETAIL d ON o.distributor_id = d.user_id
SELECT count(1) FROM TNT_ORDER o INNER JOIN TNT_USER_DETAIL d ON o.distributor_id = d.user_id

SELECT count(1) FROM TNT_ORDER o,tnt_channel c
o.channel_id = c.channel_id and c.channel_code='DISTRIBUTOR_API'

select count(1) from ( select distinct o.ORDER_ID,o.PARTNER_ORDER_ID, o.DISTRIBUTOR_NAME, c.channel_name, c.channel_ID, o.CONTACT_NAME, o.CONTACT_MOBLIE, o.order_Amount, o.QUANTITY, o.REFUND_STATUS, f.REFUND_AMOUNT, f.FACTORAGE, o.sys_flag, d.is_24_refund, d.user_config_args from tnt_order o left JOIN TNT_ORDER_REFUND f ON o.partner_order_id = f.partner_order_id left join tnt_user_detail d on o.distributor_id=d.user_id left join tnt_channel c on o.channel_id = c.channel_id
o.PARTNER_ORDER_ID is not null
and d.user_config_args like '%IS_API2%'
AND (d.user_config_args is null or d.user_config_args not like '%IS_API2%')
)

select distinct o.ORDER_ID,o.PARTNER_ORDER_ID, o.DISTRIBUTOR_NAME, c.channel_name, c.channel_ID, o.CONTACT_NAME, o.CONTACT_MOBLIE, o.order_Amount, o.QUANTITY, o.REFUND_STATUS, f.REFUND_AMOUNT, f.FACTORAGE, o.sys_flag, d.is_24_refund, d.user_config_args from tnt_order o left JOIN TNT_ORDER_REFUND f ON o.partner_order_id = f.partner_order_id left join tnt_user_detail d on o.distributor_id=d.user_id left join tnt_channel c on o.channel_id = c.channel_id
o.PARTNER_ORDER_ID is not null
and d.user_config_args like '%IS_API2%'
AND (d.user_config_args is null or d.user_config_args not like '%IS_API2%')
order by o.ORDER_ID desc

select distinct o.ORDER_ID,o.PARTNER_ORDER_ID, o.DISTRIBUTOR_NAME, c.channel_name, c.channel_ID, o.CONTACT_NAME, o.CONTACT_MOBLIE, o.order_Amount, o.QUANTITY, o.REFUND_STATUS, o.order_Status, o.RESOURCE_CONFIRM_STATUS, o.payment_Status, o.sys_flag, o.order_Channel from tnt_order o ,tnt_channel c o.channel_id = c.channel_id and c.channel_code='DISTRIBUTOR_API'
order by o.ORDER_ID desc
SELECT count(*) FROM TNT_ORDER o

select nvl(sum(o.quantity), 0) from LVMAMA_PET.tnt_order o
o.SYS_FLAG = 'VST' and (o.REFUND_STATUS !='FINISHED' or o.REFUND_STATUS is null)

select rownum, d.order_id orderId, d.downpayment_status downpaymentStatus, d.downpayment_amount downpaymentAmount, d.finalpayment_status finalpaymentStatus, d.finalpayment_amount finalpaymentAmount, d.finalpayment_paytarget finalpaymentPayTarget, d.finalpayment_paytime finalpaymentPaytime, d.remark from TNT_DOWNPAYMENT_ORDER d where rownum = 1 and d.order_id =#{orderId}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT DISTINCT tntOrder.PRODUCT_ID, COUNT(*) AS orderCount FROM TNT_ORDER tntOrder WHERE tntOrder.PRODUCT_ID IS NOT NULL AND tntOrder.CHANNEL_ID LIKE '%102%' AND tntOrder.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'HOTEL' AND tntOrder.CREATE_TIME IS NOT NULL AND tntOrder.CREATE_TIME >= to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND tntOrder.CREATE_TIME <= to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM TNT_HOTEL_PRODUCT thp, HOTEL_META_TIME_PRICE hmta, TNT_PRODUCT product WHERE tntOrder.PRODUCT_ID = thp.PRODUCT_ID AND thp.SYS_FLAG = 'VST' AND thp.VALID = 'Y' AND thp.PRODUCT_ID = product.PRODUCT_ID AND thp.GOODS_ID = product.BRANCH_ID AND product.CHANNEL_IDS IS NOT NULL AND product.CHANNEL_IDS LIKE '%102%' AND thp.HOTEL_STATUS = 'Y' AND thp.PAY_TO_LVMAMA = 'PREPAID' AND thp.GOODS_STATUS = 'Y' AND thp.CATEGORY_ID = 1 AND thp.PACKAGE_FLAG = 'N' AND hmta.META_GOODS_ID = thp.GOODS_ID AND hmta.SPEC_DATE = TO_DATE(#{queryDay},'YYYY-MM-DD') and hmta.ONSALE_FLAG = 'Y') GROUP BY tntOrder.PRODUCT_ID ORDER BY orderCount DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TNT_ORDER tntOrder WHERE tntOrder.PRODUCT_ID IS NOT NULL AND tntOrder.CHANNEL_ID LIKE '%102%' AND tntOrder.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'ROUTE' AND tntOrder.CREATE_TIME IS NOT NULL AND tntOrder.CREATE_TIME >= to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND tntOrder.CREATE_TIME <= to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND tntOrder.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}

SELECT tod.tnt_order_id tntorderid,tod.order_id orderid,tod.distributor_id distributorid,tod.distributor_name distributorname, tod.payment_status paymentstatus,tod.perform_status performstatus,tod.order_status orderstatus,to_char(tod.visit_time,'yyyy-MM-dd') visittime, floor(SYSDATE-tod.visit_time) timeoutperiod FROM tnt_order tod,tnt_user_detail tud WHERE tod.distributor_id=tud.user_id and tod.payment_status='PAYED' AND tod.perform_status!='PERFORM' AND tod.visit_time IS NOT NULL AND tod.order_status ='NORMAL' and tud.user_config_args like '%CANCEL_AFTER_VERIFICATION%'

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TNT_ORDER o
AND o.VISIT_TIME < sysdate

SELECT count(1) FROM TNT_ORDER o
AND o.VISIT_TIME < sysdate

SELECT o.ORDER_ID,o.PARTNER_ORDER_ID, o.DISTRIBUTOR_NAME, o.CHANNEL_ID, o.CONTACT_NAME, o.CONTACT_MOBLIE, o.CREATE_TIME, o.PAYMENT_TIME, o.VISIT_TIME, o.PERFORM_STATUS, o.SYS_FLAG FROM TNT_ORDER o
AND o.VISIT_TIME < sysdate
ORDER BY o.CREATE_TIME DESC
